headline.print_headline: Timeline: Ukraine Crisis and Russia's Stand-Off With the West
headline.main: Timeline: Ukraine Crisis and Russia's Stand-Off With the West

docs.snippet: Here is a timeline of the fall of Ukraine's government, Russia's subsequent annexation of Ukraine's Crimea and growing unrest in eastern Ukraine where armed pro-Russian separatists have seized government buildings....
docs.lead_paragraph: Here is a timeline of the fall of Ukraine's government, Russia's subsequent annexation of Ukraine's Crimea and growing unrest in eastern Ukraine where armed pro-Russian separatists have seized government buildings.

headline.print_headline: Netanyahu Tells Abbas to 'Tear Up' Pact With Hamas
headline.main: Netanyahu Tells Abbas to 'Tear Up' Pact With Hamas

docs.snippet: Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu urged Palestinian President Mahmoud Abbas on Sunday to "tear up" his pact with Hamas, saying Israel would not take part in Middle East peace talks with a Palestinian government backed by the Islamist group...
docs.lead_paragraph: Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu urged Palestinian President Mahmoud Abbas on Sunday to "tear up" his pact with Hamas, saying Israel would not take part in Middle East peace talks with a Palestinian government backed by the Islamist group.

headline.print_headline: Juve Coach Conte Fumes at 'Provincial' Garcia
headline.main: Juve Coach Conte Fumes at 'Provincial' Garcia

docs.snippet: Furious Juventus coach Antonio Conte dismissed alleged comments by AS Roma counterpart Rudi Garcia as "provincial" and "bar talk" on Sunday, adding more spice to the Serie A title race between the two sides....
docs.lead_paragraph: Furious Juventus coach Antonio Conte dismissed alleged comments by AS Roma counterpart Rudi Garcia as "provincial" and "bar talk" on Sunday, adding more spice to the Serie A title race between the two sides.

headline.print_headline: London Braced for Travel Disruption on Underground Rail Workers Strike Plan
headline.main: London Braced for Travel Disruption on Underground Rail Workers Strike Plan

docs.snippet: Millions of commuters were preparing for transport chaos from Monday evening as workers on the London Underground rail network plan to hold a two-day strike in a dispute over plans to cut jobs and close ticket offices....
docs.lead_paragraph: Millions of commuters were preparing for transport chaos from Monday evening as workers on the London Underground rail network plan to hold a two-day strike in a dispute over plans to cut jobs and close ticket offices.

headline.print_headline: France Defers G.E. Plan to Buy Energy Business
headline.main: France Defers G.E. Plan to Buy Energy Business

docs.snippet: The French economy minister said economic sovereignty was at stake and that Siemens – Alstom’s German rival – was making an offer of its own....
docs.abstract: The French economy minister said economic sovereignty was at stake and that Siemens – Alstom’s German rival – was making an offer of its own.

headline.print_headline: AP PHOTOS: John XXIII, John Paul II Names Saints
headline.main: AP PHOTOS: John XXIII, John Paul II Names Saints

docs.snippet: Pope Francis declared Popes John XXIII and John Paul II saints on Sunday in an unprecedented ceremony made even more historic by the presence of emeritus Pope Benedict XVI in St. Peter's Square....
docs.lead_paragraph: Pope Francis declared Popes John XXIII and John Paul II saints on Sunday in an unprecedented ceremony made even more historic by the presence of emeritus Pope Benedict XVI in St. Peter's Square.

headline.print_headline: 1,300 Muslims Leave C. African Republic Capital
headline.main: 1,300 Muslims Leave C. African Republic Capital

docs.snippet: Heavily armed peacekeepers escorted some of the last remaining Muslims out of Central African Republic's volatile capital on Sunday, trucking more than 1,300 people who for months had been trapped by violent Christian militants....
docs.lead_paragraph: Heavily armed peacekeepers escorted some of the last remaining Muslims out of Central African Republic's volatile capital on Sunday, trucking more than 1,300 people who for months had been trapped by violent Christian militants.

headline.print_headline: Liverpool Rue Failure to Get Past Chelsea's Two Buses
headline.main: Liverpool Rue Failure to Get Past Chelsea's Two Buses

docs.snippet: Liverpool coach Brendan Rodgers got his big break in football as an assistant to Jose Mourinho, but he will not be taking any lessons in how to win from his former mentor....
docs.lead_paragraph: Liverpool coach Brendan Rodgers got his big break in football as an assistant to Jose Mourinho, but he will not be taking any lessons in how to win from his former mentor.

docs.snippet: Burger King is bringing back one of its strangest advertising creations if you don't count its creepy King — the Subservient Chicken....

headline.print_headline: German-Jewish Writer Stefanie Zweig Dies at 81
headline.main: German-Jewish Writer Stefanie Zweig Dies at 81

docs.snippet: German-Jewish writer Stefanie Zweig, best known for her autobiographical novel "Nowhere in Africa" has died. She was 81....
docs.lead_paragraph: German-Jewish writer Stefanie Zweig, best known for her autobiographical novel "Nowhere in Africa" has died. She was 81.
